{{- $urls := .Params.urls -}} {{- if $urls -}} {{- $urlsHeading := .Params.urlsHeading | default (i18n "urlsHeading") | default "Links" -}}

{{ $urlsHeading }}

{{- range $urls -}} {{- $title := .title -}} {{- if $title -}} {{- $title = $title | $.Page.RenderString -}} {{- end -}} {{ ($title | default .link) }} {{- end -}}
{{- end -}}
